dataSourceSubtitle: Source for recipe data and the conditions for commercial use.
dataSourceLicenseValue: Open Data Commons Open Database License (ODbL 1.0) — commercial use permitted with attribution and share-alike on database derivatives.
dataSourceShortAttribution: Data source: Culinary Recipes Dataset (Pau Barba, Núria Canals), DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.15169428. License: ODbL 1.0. No endorsement by the authors or Zenodo.
viewLicenseDescription: Opens the official ODbL license page in your browser.
couldNotOpenLink: Could not open the link. Please try again.
dataSourceAffiliationNote: Some recipe texts and data are automatically processed from public web sources via the Culinary Recipes Dataset. This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by those websites (e.g. recipe portals such as Allrecipes.com). All trademarks and brand names belong to their respective owners.
licenseDetailsHint: Tap to view the obligations and keep for compliance records.
datasetStepAttribute: Attribute: Cite the dataset title, authors (Pau Barba, Núria Canals), DOI link, and license (ODbL 1.0) in-app and in any public outputs.
datasetStepChanges: Change notice: State if you cleaned, translated, or enriched the recipes.
datasetStepShareAlike: Share-alike (database): If you publish or give public access to a modified database, release it under ODbL 1.0 and provide an access/download link.
datasetStepPrivateUse: App-only use: If your modified database stays private to this app and you do not redistribute it, share-alike is not triggered; still keep attribution and notices.
datasetStepProducedWorks: Produced works: The app or visualizations can stay closed-source; just keep the attribution and license notice.
datasetStepNotices: Preserve notices: Do not remove copyright/license notices when redistributing the data.
datasetStepNoEndorsement: No endorsement: Make clear the dataset authors and Zenodo do not endorse the app.
safetyStepEvidence: Keep a copy of the original download with version/DOI and download date for auditability.
safetyStepDocumentChanges: Document your transformations, scripts, and versions so you can show what changed.
safetyStepContentReview: Review the data for personal data, incorrect nutrition/health claims, or sensitive content before publishing.
clickFilterForMore: Click 'Filter' to narrow down the recipes.
foodSelectionText1: Only recipes with the selected ingredients in this area will be displayed. This way, you can see recipes that can be made with the ingredients you have.
foodSelectionText2: Only recipes with the selected features in this area will be displayed. This way, you can see recipes that meet your desired filters.
filteringDialogSubtitle: Hang tight while we prepare your matches.
filteringMessage1: Matching your ingredients with our recipe book...
filteringMessage2: Shaking the pan—good things take a few seconds.
filteringMessage3: Checking which cuisines fit your pantry.
filteringMessage4: Simmering options so you can cook faster.
filteringMessage5: Almost there! Setting the table for your results.
initialIngredientsText1: On this page, you can save the ingredients you want as pre-selected on your phone instead of selecting them every time.
noFavoritesYet: You don't have any favorite recipes yet.
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
feedbackSubmitFailed: We could not send your feedback. Please try again.
areYouSureYouWanttoDeleteAllSavedIngredi: Are you sure you want to delete all saved ingredients?
IfYouSaveYourCookingIngredientsinMyKitch: If You Save Your Cooking Ingredients in 'My Kitchen' You Won't Have to Select Them Again Every Time!
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
maintenanceBody: The app is temporarily offline while we update recipes and data. Please check back shortly.
maintenanceStaticDescription: We are doing a quick refresh. Some actions are paused for now.
updateRequiredBody: Please update to continue. Latest version: {version}
closeAppHint: Close the app from the app switcher.
